product_name: Rossignol BC X11 75mm Backcountry Ski Boot
long_description: The Rossignol BC X11 75mm backcountry ski boots let you get off the beaten path and make turns in untouched terrain. BC X11 boots are a great match for the lightweight metal-edged, no-wax skis designed for backcountry tours in deep snow. Custom thermal-moldable inner liner can be heated up and molded to your foot for a custom fit that greatly enhances comfort; see an REI ski shop professional for a fitting. 75mm sole is compatible with 3-pin bindings and telemark cable bindings. Neoprene lace cover flexes easily with your foot and keeps snow and ice out of the boot. Inner locking lace system and 2 ratcheting buckles let you fine-tune the fit for touring and downhill skiing. Plastic cuff enhances torsional stability for good performance while turning.
short_description: The Rossignol BC X11 75mm backcountry ski boots let you get off the beaten path and make turns in untouched terrain.
